PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2007-02932007-03-05LAB,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Labour Code
PrecisAppointment of GRAHAM CLARKE of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a Vice-Chairperson of the Canada Industrial Relations Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, on a full-time basis; and orders that GRAHAM CLARKE be deemed to be employed in the Public Service for the purposes of the Public Service Superannuation Act; effective April 23, 2007.
AttachmentsAttachment
